name: He's Just My Buddy!
description:
Caden and Iver are roommates. They got along so well that they became close friends. One day, Iver mentions that he wants to date someone. Since he is very timid, Caden offers to be his matchmaker. If Caden successfully finds a date for Iver, his friend will end up with the said person. But if the matchmaking fails, Iver will still be single and the two friends will continue their daily routine. 

As time goes on, maybe they'll start to realize their feelings for each other might be more than just friendship.


-Learn Iver's dating preferences.

-Purposely set him up with someone he's incompatible with. If he ends up dating one of them, whoopppss Caden will be all alone.

-10K+ Words/ 1 Hour Playtime

-9 CGS

-1 Good Ending and 4 Bad Endings

-Purely SFW. Slice of Life
